text: The javadocs don't seem to be built on the zones server.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: it would be nice to have the apidocs back. what is the problem?
creator: nettings@apache.org
thorsten@apache.org
text:
Well, there never got build for the zones AFAIK. We need to add the javadoc step
to http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/lenya/zone/bin/stagingDocu.sh?view=log like
described in http://lenya.apache.org/docs/website-update.html#trip

"...
Create and copy the Javadoc for both branches (build javadocs, Copy from
build/webapp/site/apidocs to lenya/site/apidocs/1.2 and lenya/site/apidocs/1.4)"

Maybe better to add this step to
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/lenya/zone/bin/nightly-trunk.sh?view=log
and/or http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/lenya/zone/bin/nightly-branch.sh?view=log
